content: I love the app, but...it will no longer export Max Prep reports for import. I run the latest version of Android.
replyContent: Josh, Thanks for the heads up. We are investigating. We continue to support Max Preps export and are looking into the cause of the issue.

content: I can't email the box score, only the shot chart. Can you help me out?
replyContent: Hello, you should have a response for your support request. We believe there is issue with the email client you are using. Please see those suggestions and review the link provided. Please let us know if you are unable to see that correspondence.

content: Bought the App and Can't share any stats via Email... Why??
replyContent: Please make sure your email app is setup correctly. Basketball StatTracker picks up default email app on your device to share via Email. If you still have difficulty please use in-app chat help or send email to support@hachisoft.com and we can help you further.

content: Overall works very well and will continue to use it. Stats are more comprehensive than other apps I have used and the shot graphics are nice. Suggestions for improvements: Group stat buttons by category Defensive – Reb, block, steal Offensive – Reb, Assist, TO Fouls Add light color code to stat button (red for TO, Fouls and green for Reb, assist, etc.) Undo feature to roll back entry mistakes. Bball icon gives access to history, which can edit or delete items, but not player subs. Allow player sub corrections to be made in this window as well. Additionally, simple undo button to sequence through last entries would speed that process up. Also would be nice to have configuration option for the undo button to automatically reset clock to time of last entry (useful for those entering stats off of video) Bench – when in landscape and you access the bench, the screen rotates to portrait. Leave in landscape and divide players on floor to left and bench list to right Add report to excel. Can copy and paste from the html, but formatting is always a mess to correct, as it tries to enter stats as dates or assumes a fraction and converts to decimal.
replyContent: Thanks for your suggestions. We will add to our enhancements list.  Please note, there is "Undo" by press+hold on the "ball" icon and dragging to the undo button.  I might also suggest looking into our LIVE version.  It has video storage / video breakdowns / tracking via video / Live Stats  and more. Hit us up at support@hachisoft.com

content: I like the app, but how do input the score of the opponent to finalise the game?
replyContent: Michael, please reach out to us at support@hachisoft.com or use the in-app chat.  We would be happy to take you through the different ways you can do this and will allow us to talk without a character count.

content: Looks like a really detailed app. Can't wait to see the +/- category. Is there a maximum fouls category per player? When player gets to maximum, automatically sub them out. That's about the only thing missing.
replyContent: Thanks for your kind words.   We have decided to not actively sub players out when they reach a maximum to allow for situations like scrimmages, exhibition, summer games, and practices.

content: Can the stats sheet be exported into excel
replyContent: Hi Marwan, you can push your data up to the cloud and at the "Team" level you can download a bunch of stat reports (Player Rating, Cumulative, Offensive Rating, Defensive Rating, Player Combinations). We include in this an .xlsx file for game and team reports.

content: I love the app. I coach a Rep team and can't do stats during games. I do all my stats on this app while watching video. Can you provide a way make a tag for when players are together. I would love to be able to see how players stats are when playing with one or more other individuals. See who is playing best with my top 3 players. Or who shouldn't be playing together. Also. I want to see my teams stats vs all teams combined not just individual teams games.
replyContent: Thanks Jym!  I have added these ideas to our enhancement list for further discussion. I like the analysis that this could provide.  If you have anything to add, come and chat with us at support@hachisoft.com.

content: Tried this app out tonight at my daughters game. Does really well. Once I was used to the UI it was easy for me to keep track of everything. Only complaints are: 1. The tutorial shows half of the message off the screen when going over live stats. 2. When dragging from team/player to court it selects whatever stat you let go on. Would be better, in my opinion, to have it to where you let go and then select stat. One way I found to get around this was to drag onto the court where it wasn't going to pull up the stat menu and then you can let go without it selecting a stat, then view the menu and tap the stat you wanted. Other than that, it is an excellent app. Especially impressed with how well it performed on my very old RCA Viking Pro 10. Will continue to use it throughout the season. If you would, please make a Windows 10 version as I will be changing to a Windows tablet soon.
replyContent: Hi Kevin, Thanks for your kind words.  Your complaints are noted as we continue to make all of our apps work and perform better.  We do have a web application version in conjunction with the newly released Basketball StatTracker LIVE apps.  It can work on a connected windows tablet. Reach out to us at support@hachisoft.com and we can explain more.

content: Horrible user interface. Way too many clicks to setup teams and line ups. Not sure where a 4.4 rating is coming from. For what I just paid I expect much better.
replyContent:
Chris, thanks for your feedback.  We take everyones opinion to heart and will continue to look for ways to improve the app.  If you have any suggestions we would love to hear them please reach out to us at support@hachisoft.com.

Hachisoft Support

content: Love the App! Please add a quick "Done" button under "all players to the bench" when subbing. Youth basketball subs kids in so fast I miss stats clicking the elipsis and then done each substitution. Otherwise this is everything I was looking for in a stat tracker app! Great work!
replyContent:
Hi Brad,
Thanks for the review. 
We do have a quick sub function within the app.  To use it, press and hold on the player that will be leaving the game.  This will open up a listing of all players currently on the bench.  Once a replacement is chosen the listing will automatically return back to the tracking screen.

content: please add the 4 pointer to the court
replyContent: Can you please elaborate on 4 pointer feature? or you can get in touch with us at support@hachisoft.com to discuss the feature request further.

content: Great app can't wait to try it out in a live game this season!

Love the app so far. It's a great way to keep track of stats and the team enjoys looking at how well they did. I'm not sure if there is a way to check overall player season stats just game stats. It would be nice if there was a way to check that without having to go through each game and figure it out yourself.
replyContent: You can view season stat by going to "View Stats" screen and in filter section on top; tap on "Game" and select "None".

content:
I like how easy it is to keep track of stats using this app. However, I 
would really like to be able to go back and adjust stats in the middle of 
the game, or to be able to edit the time/players substituted if I make a 
mistake. I have accidentally put the wrong time or tapped the screen wrong 
and a made basket was a miss, and I can't edit during the game, I can only 
delete the stat or put it at the end of the game which affects plus/minus 
of the players. I want to adjust the stat or time when it would have 
happened in the flow of the game to be accurate.
I need help. I deleted from the website my current season and now i can't submit it again. I have it on my android device, just can't see it on the stattracker website

Wish app required the player number instead of name.  My kid's team plays a lot of tournaments and I don't know other teams player names but can easily see their numbers.  Wish app had function to popup players on court to assign an assist when basket is made.  Also on galaxy s7 you can only see player number, cant see name due to button not resizing correctly
I can't get data... rosters, teams, games, stats... to sync to the website from my device, or vice-versa. Wish it would work. Isn't it supposed to?
Like the app but does not resize properly on Galaxy S8+. Have to make a substitution to sho information for players in game. Once this is fixed then I'd rate it higher
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. Can you please send a screenshot of the issue screen to support@hachisoft.com? We will investigate and address it in our next update.

content: Good app, easy to use. I only track my daughter's stats for the season. I wish it would show season total stats for a single player. I can only fibd single game stats. Otherwise a good app.
replyContent: You can see season total stats for single player from "View Stats" screen. Select single player after tapping on Player filter button and then tap on Games filter button and select None. Email us at support@hachisoft.com if you have any further issues.

content: This is an awesome app. I paid the Extra feed to get the heat map, but I'm only seeing it's for the sample team instead of my actual basketball team. Can this be fixed? Can this be broken down by percentage as well?
replyContent: Please make sure you are logged in on website and have submitted the season from your device. If still have difficulty accessing online stats, you can email your subscription details and issue to support@hachisoft.com and we can investigate into the issue.

content: Easy to learn, very nice and fast to use interface. Would be great to be able to edit the stats to be able to move entries, insert new ones missed during the game or play period. Overall very happy with the purchase!
replyContent:
Thank you for the review. 
The app allows to undo last stat(swype down on basketball icon), delete selective stat(tap on basketball icon on top) and insert new ones(resume game and add stat as normally). Currently, the app does not allow to edit existing stat or insert stat in middle of stat stream.

content: I need to change the email associated with my account but everytime I go to the get help tab it always says an error has occurred no matter if I am on Wi-Fi or cell service. So now I have purchased something I can't use
replyContent: The third party support chat service that we were using is no longer available. We have released newer version with updated support chat service. Please upgrade your app and try again. Also, you can always email us at support@hachisoft.com and we can help you with account transition.

content: This wouldn't start at all. I've installed and uninstalled multile times. It needs to be more reliable.
replyContent: Hi Alisha, what device are you using and what version of Android? You can also send those details to support@hachisoft.com and we can investigate into the issue you are having.

content: Outstanding for table top replays!!!

I enjoy the app and the instructions are very useful. My only issue is I haven't figured out how to end a game yet. I have for games created so data with data in each quarter but I do not see a way to close them out. It would be nice to finalize these games.
replyContent: Hi Kevin, there is no end game. The game is kept available for you to add/delete stats after the game. We will add finalize/end game to our feature requests and try to address in our future releases.

content: The app is great. I would like to see the stat report be excel friendly by delimiting the the name from the jersey # fg, 2p, and 3p, ie......fg made, fg att, fg % and so on.

LG V20  As a dad of a progressing high school basketball player, this app is great for keeping up with his stats so he can see how he is doing during his season and career as a player.  As a college basketball Coach, I can easily input players for potential recruitment, and keep track of them as well! Keep the improvements coming!  Now, how do I transfer a previous purchase from the Android store over to my New iPad Air 2, without having to pay again?? Can anyone help me out with this dilemma?? Coach Nelly
replyContent:
Hi Coach,
Thanks for your review. Unfortunately, Google Play Store and iTune Store have their own store policies and they don't have mechanism to transfer the purchase.

content: This app is easy to use and love that we can export the report to Max Preps. The only downside is I also  use it for my son's AAU team. We play a lot of other teams. I don't necessarily need to keep the others teams stats. I created a "guest" team and even if I add the location or add other team name there. I am unable to figure out from viewing stats which team we played. I don't want to add so many teams.
replyContent:
Hi, 
The stats are tied tightly to team, so you will need to create separate teams if you need to track against them individually. Only name(no other details or players) should be suffice to view stats against different teams.
We will take into consideration in our future releases to make this easier for similar cases.

content: Anyway to fix playing time?   I some how managed to get negative minutes during a game
replyContent: Please send your data to support@hachisoft.com explaining the issue and we will investigate into it.

content: Just used this app and it works very well. Have not compared to other apps, but bought the $5.99 version. Does not have forced turnover stat, which would be nice. Also nice to have, a way to "tag" events as they occur, perhaps with quick text. Since I am taping the game as well I can then quickly look up the event on tape. All in all, the more I get used to it the better it works. The quick sub by holding by long pressing works better than the sub menu, which is too slow. (also I dont like the sort by number, because i'm always looking for the name, not the player number).  For forced turnovers, I am just using "deflections" to track any hustle stat whereby the defender does something good, but where it may fall into a forced turnover rather than a steal. After googling deflection is a good way to do this. Deflection doesnt go into the efficiency ranking, for better or worse, but at least its tracked.
replyContent:
Hi Frank,
We are continuously working towards improving the app. The stats you have requested are not currently available, but I have added request for our team to add these stats in future version.
Thanks for supporting Basketball StatTracker.

content: Easy to use and keeps track of everything you need to know about your players.
How do you load the stats straight to maxpreps? I clicked the button but there was no direct link. It seems? It showed a list that includes emails.
replyContent: You can import into MaxPrep using email/file import. Unfortunately, the MaxPreps direct import license charges are expensive and we can't support it at current app pricing.

content: Really love this app. Very easy to use and looks nice on phone. I have tried to remove a shot after a couple of entries and can't seem to figure it out. Also, would be nice to be able to export directly to excel in order to better prepare the final report with stats.
replyContent:
To remove a shot/stat, tap on basketball icon on top of game screen. It will list stat list with delete icon. 
There is also a tutorial available on game screen that can be accessed by tapping on "Help" button on top left corner of game screen.

content: Easy to use..but can you export the shots screen..share etc?
replyContent: You can email the stat reports(with or without shots) to share from app. Also you can use online subscription service to share reports via website http://stattracker.com website.

content: Great app best one I've used on android devices. The developers are always wanting input and trying to improve the app. Once again, the app has improved, and I currently in the progress of trying out the online service offered by Stat Tracker . com.  Also tagging enable any stat view you can think of as a coach.
I have recently downloaded this app and love it, bu I can't seem to figure out how to recifd a forfeitted game  can someone help??
replyContent:
Hi, you can "Resume" game to delete unwanted stats. After resume, tap on basketball icon on top of your game screen to see entire list of stats. 
You can also contact us through in-app chat (Go to "Get Help" from menu on main page), if you need help while using app.

content: Great app and easy to learn to use. They update to fix things that are brought to their attention.  Excellent online chat help feature.

This app just keeps getting better and better. Love the simplicity. I would like to see a way to separate a roster of players so that I could keep stats for a whole group ( i.e. one grade of boys). If the "A" team is playing, I can move the "B" team of players to the bottom of the sub list to make subs easier to find
replyContent: Hi Michael, Thanks for the feedback. We've added your request to our feature support list. It will be supported in our future releases.

content: Love it very helpful

Great app to follow players and their game stats. Easy to configure and learning curve is super easy to track game stats. Had a question regarding the app and Tyler got back to me ASAP with the answer. Best basketball stat app out there !!!

I've used this app for a long time and love it. But I recently purchased another device and now I'm having trouble downloading it to my new tablet from the Google play store. It won't let me purchase again
replyContent: Hi, Please use the same account as the one you used to purchase on older device and it should allow you to download and install(no purchase necessary). If you are using another account let us know what error code you are getting. You can get in touch with us at support@hachisoft.com to provide details.

content: I love this app but just recently I am unable to view my stats! It says that the app has stopped working. I need to compile our end of season report and I can't. Please help!
replyContent: We are sorry that you are experiencing issues. Please use in-app Help to contact us or use "Send Data to Hachisoft Support" menu item on Basketball Stat Tracker App's main screen to send us your data and explain your issue and we will promptly take a look.

content: Basketball Stat tracker...like the ease of stat entry...very user friendly

I was looking for paper sheets to keep informal stats for my son's team and found this.  The amount of information you can collect and control is phenomenal compared to paper.  My only difficult experiences are related to being able to change bench players quick enough, but maybe more repetitive use will speed my input?  Great app.

Html is a horrible export format and that's all that is offered.   No expert to csv or pdf. No good way to print stats or export them so that you can manipulate them yourselves. I really wish I hadn't spent my money here.
replyContent: We've updated app and now more export formats are available through http://basketball.stattracker.com/.

content: Very helpful
Best basketball Stat Tracker!!!!! Easy to use, worth every penny. This App makes my life easy keeping stats for my NJCAA Basketball Teams.

Was looking for an app to record stats for sons bball games. This app has lots of functionality and can provide SERIOUSLY detailed stats by team and player. Was able to figure out the inputs within 10 min during the first use in a live game. Can email the recorded game stats to myself and the coach, too. Great app!
Cool app, an excel and pdf export would be great to work with the stats after game. Easy to record shootings with "shooting map"
Love it so far...super super simple to use! And had fun while using it. Great little app here.
Best stat tracker for android.

Very easy to use and integrates well with email to share to others. I would like the email reports to have individual shot charts though, that way all the little circles aren't overlapping each other.

With even better support.  I purchased a cheap Android tablet due to the selection of stat trackers.  I looked at the interface and it looked pretty easy.  Went out on a limb and purchased it and indeed it is pretty easy.  I had a few issues but used email and the chat feature and these guys were Johnny on the spot ready to help.  I am pretty tough on apps and devs so I am highly impressed with both.  As long as they continue to support the app these guys will definitely keep my business.  A few wants and desires but it will get you what you want easily and inexpensive.  Pull the trigger and give it a go, I don't think you will be disappointed.  Bravo Hachisoft!

Downgraded from 5 to 4. If player plays on multiple teams (or years) no way to roll up the stats or track improvement . Need to create a manage player button/option so easier to track/add/delete and Still no way to track layups. Need a way to add user defined statistics (hustles,  traps,  etc)
replyContent: Hi David, sorry to hear you're having problems with some stuff in the app. If you could contact us via support@hachisoft.com or via the in-app chat we'd be happy to see what we can do to fix some of the issues you are experiencing.

content: There needs to be an option to record dead ball rebounds, rebounds that don't count toward team totals. And it would be nice to be able to edit previous plays rather than deleting. But overall the app does its job quite well.

I thought I would write an addition to my review.  The subs issue has been resolved and the app is working very well. I would still like to record drawn fouls if possible. When reviewing the season stats it gives a total for the games played, would it be possible for it to also show the average stats per game? This would be very helpful, could this be added?
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. Average stats will be an available option in 2.2! (Should be out in December some time)

content: How do you start a new season?  Would like to not have to add players on subs, it takes too long.
replyContent: You can add players to a roster in the Edit/Add Team screen by hitting the + button located in the action bar!

content: Overall an awesome app, but the fact that you cannot modify events previous to the last one is a pain. Sometimes you add some entry to a player and later realize it was not that player who did it. In the current version, the only way to fix that is deleting ALL events following the error , correct the data, and then somehow re-enter the correct entries that you deleted to get there. Other thing is that we only take data from one team, we don't care about the other team other than it's name. It's kind of a pain having to create a team, add dummy players for every other game. I wish we could create one, and maybe duplicate/copy it, and then rename it. This would be a five star rating if it wasn't for these critical, time wasting un-features.
replyContent:
Although we don't offer a way to edit the stats yet, you don't have to delete all the stats to remove one. If you hit the ball button, you can brings up a list of all the stats recorded and just delete the errant one.

Also, you can create teams that don't have players, just delete the entries auto created.

content: Really good app for keeping stats, the best I have found. Only wish printing stats and shot charts was easier.

I had one issue with the app and when I contacted support they responded promptly, fixed the bug, and posted the update. I was impressed with the response and the finished product. The app was really cool to use. My son's teammates loved looking at all their stats.

In 2 games I have practically mastered this program.  I needed some claryfication on terms and had a few improvements to suggest so I went to the help section of the program on Sunday afternoon to leave a message.  My suggestions were heard and all was clarified by live text chat!  On  a Sunday afternoon!  Maybe this company should run the government too!  In 2 games the feedback stopped my team from trying 10 3pts shot and missing down to 1 in the last game and I did not even speak about it!  THANK YOU!
replyContent: Thanks for the kind words, Coach! We're glad the app is working well for you.

content: This program is the easiest and most flexible I have ever used.  The only improvements needed are easier editing of stats and some live connection so others can view action.   This is my first ever review too so this endorsement does not come lightly.
replyContent: Thanks for the review! The good news is the improvements you've listed are things that we've been looking into adding in the future, so hopefully we can make it even better!

content: Love this app, very helpful, lots of great stats, ready and quick
Works very well and easy to do on my phone Better that istat for iPads. great price too! Used it for the first time this weekend for a four game tournament. I had no issue keeping up with the action.
The app is great. Very intuitive interface. But the differentiator is the support. There is a built in chat support that is super responsive for tech issues as well as feature tutorials. 1st class!
With the last update this app is perfect.  Easy to score a game and keep track of stats while coaching.
Easy to use. Great app
replyContent: We've fixed the quarter by quarter stats now, take a look!

content: Basically, I'm looking for something that let's me record the location of all players at the time of a shot, foul, turnover, or other game event.   I somehow wandered past the automatic refund deadline before finding out the app wasn't what I needed. Any chance the developers can help me out here?

Use it for tracking 2 of my daughters AAU teams and a school team, have seen other dads using a couple of different ones and thry just dont compare. Any time I have had a question or needed help with anything the guys in support have been there immediately

Need to be able to correct problems or mistakes in game, didn't do it the way pointed out in tutorial.messed with it long enough to figure most of it. Didn't erase shots like explained. Errors are never a simple fix abd by the time you get it you've missed keys passes, shots, to fouls, steals ,o/d rebounds. Good a start, have a wats to go. Don't believe it was weight $5.99. A$1.99 would have been more appropriate until upgrades were made. Keep at it, till get it. THANKS TOM Mattingly
replyContent:
Hello. sorry you're having issues figuring out some editing things in the app. Stats are deleted by hitting the ball button and deleting the stat from the list. The cancel on shots is for erroneous entry, but won't delete shots after they are entered.

We are adding an undo button, which will be accessed by swiping down on the ball button.

content: So good and user friendly. Graphics are cool for shot tracking. It takes a few real games to get used to keeping stats but then it gets easier. That's just reality and has nothing to do with the app.  Once you get the hang of it and learn how to make corrections on the fly its great. Also, sitting with someone who can help when things get crazy is nice. For me, an interested parent works nicely.  When you first start try what I did. Instead of using 5 players per side, I only track 3 players total as follows:  #32 My Son, #10 Teammates and #20 Opponents (other team). That way you only have to switch between 3 different players. Still keeps you really busy when the action is fast paced but it's manageable. Then as you get faster you can add a player. But, don't think you will track all players accurately. It's just too much. Bottom line, great app!  Customer service for questions and suggestions has been OUTSTANDING!!
replyContent: Hello, thank you for the review! Pro tip: when you want to just track a team, or everyone but an individual, you can use the team buttons, and it will assign all the stats not given to a player to a team as a whole. We're glad you like the app!

content: Great app.  Very responsive customer support.
Great app
I really love this app! It is kind of frustrating that the minutes per game feature is not accurate, but otherwise it is very helpful!
replyContent: Hi Eric, could you send us an email (support@hachisoft.com) detailing the minutes issues you are having? We'd be keenly interested in investigating this.

content: I've tried a number of apps and this one makes capture the easiest IMHO.  Swipe shot capture, substitutions, minutes and other stat capture is easy and intuitive.  I'd improve this rating to a 5 if the reporting were more robust.  I'm looking for a score book report that combines box score with team and player shot charts in one click.  I can easily and quickly view all of this on the tablet (really like that!), but would like to one-touch an email to the head coach with all the game info.
After I sign into my amazon account,  it gives me a server error saying, error logging into stat tracker website. Please try again later.
replyContent: Hi Michael, we've had some issues with the website and are in transition to a different means for logging in that should be better and less buggy, sorry for the inconvenience in the mean time.

content: Best app ever
Good job to the developers! I have an issue with coaches only able to see the stat reports on a mobile device. Thats the only problem I have!

Would like to request though. When exporting files. Can we make the( field goals made & field goal attempt, 3pt made & 3pt attemp, ftm & fta ). In seperate fields? It would be enable the users of the app to compute player fg% 3p% ft% ave in a season. Playoffs. N career. Hope u guys can make an update. Very much appreciated.
replyContent: Thanks for the review! We've got a few updates up our sleeves before the season is up, and there will be some data export stuff included in those updates. Keep an eye out for that a bit later this year.

content: I coach middle school kids and I love this app. Great update.

Edit: After working with the support group over the last few days, they were QUICK to find a workaround for me until they can release a new update. Old:I don't like the new updates... Slower to add rebounds/turnovers/assists etc with the new swipe action. I also preferred to use it in portrait mode, now the app is forced into landscape mode.  Bad description of new changes, had they all been listed I would not have updated. Please bring back old version!!

I bought this two days ago. Previous version was great!  Didn't want the update and didn't realise it would self update. Too much dragging to add in player stats which slows the user down in live games. Any chance I can get the previous version back?
replyContent: We've added a "quick stats" method into the app for those that would prefer on screen buttons. To activate it, hit the settings button and click "Switch to Quick Stats".

content: Since I made the decision to switch my stat gathering from laptop to tablet, I have tried a few apps, and this one is head and shoulders above the rest. I only hope for a live broadcast feature in the future, for people not present at games to be able to track the stats real time.

Excellent app.  Data entry & viewing are flawless on my Nexus 10. Has never crashed.  Used for Texas AAU league games. Coach & players hit the stats right after the game. We track the season & do more stat manipulation in Excel (you email an HTML file to extract individual game or season total stats). You can simultaneously track your team & your opponents stats or just track your team alone. App provides stats in numbers AND shot location charts. Latest update adds stat export fixes & makes the UI even better.  Database can be backed up. Export data file does not transfer cross platform (no apple to android database file transfer) but that is reasonable. Support is very responsive - I had a small problem & it was fixed in 4 days.  Buy it!

I have been using this app for a little over a month for our Varsity games and scouting for our upcoming games and we love this app. When looking for apps to keep our stats, we mostly found apps that did stats or shot charts, but not both. We were looking specifically for an app that did the +/- stat and shot chart. I came across Basketball Stat Tracker which solved all of our problems cause it has both. The in-app support is a really good feature and the support team is really good with helping and taking suggestions to improve their app. With each update they are pushing out new great features and improving their app. I would definitely and have recommended this app to others.

I started using this app last week for my son's games.  This app is easy to use during the game.  The coach really liked the stats after the game and being able to see who and where the shots were taken from on the court.  I had some feedback for the developer and they got back to me within hours.       There are a lot of stat trackers out there.  This one is worth the money.
great app but does anybody know how to export a max preps if so this will be a great app if you can
replyContent: To do a max preps export, go to the View Stats screen. Select the game and team you want to create the report for and then select "Max Preps Export" from the menu options.

content: Nice app... Works well and looks great, but it does crash a lot. It is not a big deal, however, as you just re-enter the game, only losing a few seconds.
replyContent: Hi Dave, we have been looking into the crashes and trying to address them with each release. Hopefully it's getting better, if you are running into one consistently please contact us via email and we'll try to figure out what's going on.

content: I am able to keep up with the game.  The new HTML reports are leaps and bounds better than the previous outputs.  I can't say enough about the prompt response from support when I contacted them.  This is the fourth basketball app I have tried and I can now stop looking for just the right one - this is it!
Best low cost bball app available - bar none

Just needs a few minor changes. The ability to edit teams in the edit team mode. 1)Once you are up to so many teams it doesn't allow you to scroll down to the rest of the ones you entered to be able to edit them. 2) add the ability to choose to just keep one teams stats to allow more room for shot chart etc., not everyone keeps both teams stats 3)there is a long pause after saving a change to sub in players during the game which causes a miss in keeping up with the game during saving changes. If it is a fast paced game you miss stats waiting. 4)just a idea to add some charts or graphs for the visual effect for stats. These are just some of my ideas I will gladly give it 5 stars as soon as the long pause after substitutions is fixed and the ability to edit all the teams on the edit team list. This is a great looking app and works almost flawlessly.

Tracks everything and is maintainable at the fast pace of the game. Only thing I would add is a time tracker. (which is supposed to come in the next update), and a way to transfer information between devices besides email. But really a great app and awesome customer service. I highly recommend to anyone managing or following basketball teams or players

IMO the best available bball stat keeper app for android. Tech support is responsive & professional. Glitch with subs input was fixed after I notified them of issue. I am eagerly anticipating future versions - hoping to see option to track minutes played. Developers appreciate feedback and I feel confident they are going to continue to find ways to improve it!  Great value in this app and it allows you track multiple teams.
Not great cause of glitches with subs input.
replyContent: We should now have the glitches fixed in the newest version. Check it out!
